title: Kami Sumeragi Yuusha no Eiyuutan 《Ryokou Tan》 - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Drama   Fantasy   Harem   Martial Arts   Mature   Romance   Shounen   Supernatural
tags: Aristocracy   Bullying   Calm Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Dungeons   Evil Gods   Evolution   Fast Learner   Game Elements   Genius Protagonist   God Protagonist   Goddesses   Godly Powers   Gods   Handsome Male Lead   Male Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   R-15   Race Change   Skill Assimilation   Skill Creation   Strategist   Transported to Another World
author: Steel Bambou
description: He was strong. With a handsome appearance, he was even stronger than his father, the one who was called the strongest. The student enjoyed his youth inside his High School. However, because he was on really good terms with the three major goddesses of the campus, he concealed his strength. Because of other’s jealousy, he was bullied daily. One day, Tetsuya was summoned with his classroom into another world. Although he should have earned a cheat ability, he received nothing. His status was even below the average villager! But with no ability and a weak status, how much could be done, even by a genius? Thus, he got bullied and dropped inside a Dungeon. But his true abilities awakened inside the Dungeon! The epic tale of the traveler begins now! >
